SUB R3, R3, R3
SUB R4, R4, R4
SUB R5, R5, R5
ADD R3, R3, 13
ADD R4, R4, 7
CMP R4, 0
BLE 40
ADD R5, R5, R3
SUB R4, R4, 1
B 20
B 40
